name: Cranes
description: Cranes is a 3D physics-puzzle game where you need to use cranes to move boxes to specific locations.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
